txt.en: Your successful damaging melee attacks increase your critical chance by 1% and stack up to five times. Scoring a critical hit resets this effect.
Your successful damaging melee attacks increase your critical chance by 2% and stack up to five times. Scoring a critical hit resets this effect.
Your successful damaging melee attacks increase your critical chance by 3% and stack up to five times. Scoring a critical hit resets this effect.
Your successful damaging melee attacks increase your critical chance by 4% and stack up to five times. Scoring a critical hit resets this effect.
Your successful damaging melee attacks increase your critical chance by 5% and stack up to five times. Scoring a critical hit resets this effect.
